description: {"blocks":[{"key":"b73i7","text":"Purpose and Scope of the Procedure","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8ugcb","text":"Standardize process for receiving lung donations for COVID-19 studies","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"323ha","text":"Scope: Coordination of screening, acceptance and receipt of tissue for research program","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cn64r","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5fsa1","text":"Principles ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3jjnf","text":"Lung  donations rejected for transplantation can be used to understand human lung structure and development, ultimately to improve care of patients with lung disease","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5vf7n","text":"Rapid, standardized and safe processing of SARS-CoV2 infected human tissue requires coordination of a team of staff, materials and attention to protocols","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8qb44","text":"See BSL2+ Safety Protocol (616.1, 617.1 URMC HTC BSL2+ Lung Tissue Protocols)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fa2ev","text":"Rapid processing is required to maintain the tissues in a state as close to state at death as possible","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

fork_info.title: 602.2 Donor Acceptance Criteria for URMC HTC HuBMAP and LungMAP Inclusion

funders.funder_name: NIH Biorepository for INvestigation of Diseases of the Lung (BRINDL) - Phase II
NIH: COVID Supplemental - Biorepository for INvestigation of Diseases of the Lung (BRINDL)
NIH HuBMAP:KULMAP: Human Kidney, Urinary Tract and Lung Mapping Center

groups.title: Human BioMolecular Atlas Program (HuBMAP) Method Development Community

guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"58grh","text":"Safety and Regulatory Considerations: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"7lhk3","text":"Needs and Privacy of donating family should be respected at all times","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"1j25m","text":"Consent for tissue donation for research should be freely given","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"bbkdk","text":"Proper consent process will be assured. ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"ejojm","text":"Organs and biospecimens should be shipped safely and expeditiously","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"432ms","text":"Shipping will meet the minimum requirement for dangerous goods under 49 CFR 172.700 and IATA 1.5. ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"d7tp2","text":"Contact Information for Referral Groups ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"ab8ml","text":"NDRI - https://ndriresource.org/for-researchers","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"39ujf","text":"IIAM - https://iiam.org/researchers","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"1l05d","text":"Seattle HTC – Dr. Gail Deutsch","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it’s working

steps.section: Review Case: accept or decline based on eligibility
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"6ugak","text":"Take referral call or BRINDL screening report","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Review Case: accept or decline based on eligibility
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"cau3f","text":"Review Eligibility Criteria","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Review Case: accept or decline based on eligibility
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"4s7s9","text":"Start Case Record in BRINDL Inventory Screening Log","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Review Case: accept or decline based on eligibility
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"ce5tc","text":"Inclusion Criteria","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b2cgu","text":"1.Gestational age \u003e/= 22 0/7 weeks and live born","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9adi","text":"2.Age \u003c 99 completed years of age ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"37s1b","text":"3.Known time of death ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2a50t","text":"        3.1.Priority to donors after declaration of brain death by clinical care team, if appropriate, and planned recovery with minimal WIT","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5muff","text":"        3.2.Death in hospital (ex. delivery room, NICU, PICU, Emergency or Operating Room) ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cd9bg","text":"        3.3.Known time of death prior to arrival in referral hospital","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"s8d","text":"        3.4.Warm Ischemia Time (WIT) prior to organ cooling as short as possible;","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"rac2","text":"            may accept up to 6 hours, max of 12 hours in unusual circumstance","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8dbg4","text":"4.Sample is to be lung unable to place for transplantation, biopsy of lung to be used for transplant or explanted diseased lung at transplant.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"mcuc","text":"    5.Bystander normal tissue from lung resection, less preferred","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dubd3","text":"    6. Disease/Exposure: Type II diabetes, current smoker, hypertension noted and accepted with limitations","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ci99i","text":"    7. Evidence of acute respriatory failure (PaO2/FiO2 \u003c/= 300) due to pneumonia/ARDS or other cause acceptable if associated with COVID-19 disease or appropriate comparative non-COVID-19 disease","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5n07k","text":"    8. Correctly completed consent by donor, or authorization by next of kin, for donation for research","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Review Case: accept or decline based on eligibility
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"6vvn9","text":"Exclusion criteria","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f6mhs","text":"1.Warm Ischemia Time Unknown or \u003e 12 hours ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"chtd9","text":"2.Infection with high-level organism (Category A) representing risk for processing and shipment.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4o4ml","text":"3.Disease/Exposure exclusions: cystic fibrosis, heavy tobacco or alcohol abuse","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4ra9s","text":"4.Evidence of significant lung trauma","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Review Case: accept or decline based on eligibility
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"2kp6i","text":"Priority acceptance","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1jd0q","text":"1.Known lung disease – primary or secondary lung disease due to SARS-CoV-2","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"braih","text":"2.Normal lungs for comparison to SARS-CoV-2 infections","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4dbn4","text":"3.Secondary disease following documented SARS-CoV-2 infection with potential attribution to that infection, such as unexpected pulmonary or brain thrombosis.  History and evaluation for diagnoses must be available.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Requested processing protocol for Donation following Brain Death Declaration (DBD)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"5qpqo","text":"Organ Procurement Organization Recovery Team prepares for organ recovery as consistent with organ transplant protocol with cross clamp and in situ cold flush body cooling with minimal warm ischemic time.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"535ub","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"31o6j","text":"Includes flush with UW/SPS-1, HTK or similar organ transplant buffer, until solution runs clear","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Requested processing protocol for Donation following Brain Death Declaration (DBD)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"25ves","text":"Recover 1-2 Whole Lung(s) en bloc with at least the lower 1/3 of the trachea.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Requested processing protocol for Donation following Brain Death Declaration (DBD)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"7fog0","text":"Complete a minimum back-table lung flush with transplant buffer of 500ml into the pulmonary artery and 500ml into the pulmonary vein. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"dqvpa","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"a7okn","text":"Do not flush with saline.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"bfabr","text":"Do not wrap in surgical towel.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Requested processing protocol for Donation following Brain Death Declaration (DBD)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"596im","text":"Staple, clamp, or tie the trachea closed prior to shipping. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Requested processing protocol for Donation following Brain Death Declaration (DBD)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"2eeu","text":"Place Lung(s) in a Specimen Bag and submerge with chilled UW/SPS-1 or HTK. Triple bag the tissue.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Requested processing protocol for Donation following Brain Death Declaration (DBD)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"3mqe6","text":"If available, recover the Whole Thymus. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"21ovi","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"dcj9b","text":"Place in a conical tube/specimen cup filled with chilled UW/SPS-1 or HTK.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Requested processing protocol for Donation following Brain Death Declaration (DBD)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"arjkp","text":"If available, recover at least 3 cm x 3 cm x 3 cm of Spleen. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"5jn33","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"13nkt","text":"Place in a Specimen Bag or a Rigid Container filled with chilled UW/SPS-1 or HTK.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Requested processing protocol for Donation following Brain Death Declaration (DBD)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"9cnt6","text":"If available, recover a 10 CC sample of Blood in a Blood Tube - Green Top (Heparin). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"4icmb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"anrse","text":"Immediately following recovery, invert the tube several times to mix with the anticoagulant.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Requested processing protocol for Donation following Cardiac Death /Arrest(DCD)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"b9iim","text":"Organ Procurement Organization / Recovery Team prepares for organ recovery as quickly following Cardiac Arrest while in comfort care as authorized by next of kin.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"9osg1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Requested processing protocol for Donation following Cardiac Death /Arrest(DCD)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"512db","text":"Remainder of organ / tissue recovery should be as consistent with organ transplant protocol (section above) as possible.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"91r4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"i4dg","text":"Includes organ flush with UW/SPS-1 or HTK until solution runs clear.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Requested processing protocol for Donation following Cardiac Death /Arrest(DCD)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"3htmt","text":"While warm ischemic time is to be minimized, tissues may be accepted up to 6 hours WIT, 12 hours in unusual circumstances where disease is rare and research critical","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"6s8lv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"eo3e4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Requested processing protocol for Donation following Cardiac Death /Arrest(DCD)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"dp9v9","text":"Times of cardiac death and beginning of cold perfusion of organ or cross clamp is to be recorded and reported with Metadata","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Preparation for Shipping
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"6gsvm","text":"Recovery Team to package and ship such as to meet requirements of 49 CFR 172.700 and IATA 1.5.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"657fm","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"d7gc0","text":"Shipment is to reach HTC within 24 hours of recovery.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Preparation for Shipping
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"6crp8","text":"Label each Specimen Bag or Rigid Container with project code, tissue, and recovery team donor number.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Preparation for Shipping
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"8r93l","text":"Place Lung, Thymus, and Spleen tissues in the organ box on wet ice and maintain at 2-8°C until shipment.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Preparation for Shipping
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"46vfq","text":"The Blood vial should be placed outside the organ box but within the shipping container within a biohazard bag. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"ddk2r","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"9s8si","text":"Recommend to cut a small well in the Styrofoam container for vial security. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"3t5et","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"ec1iu","text":"Blood sample should not be immersed or placed in direct contact with wet ice to avoid freezing and loss of WBC viability.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Preparation for Shipping
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"d0f3n","text":"HTC: Track case, arrange for transfer from courier to URMC HTC Processing Lab","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Metadata
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"8egbq","text":"Recovery team to provide clinical metadata to include at minimum:","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"39n90","text":"1.cause and events occurring during hospitalization prior to death, ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d6goa","text":"2.any CPR required prior to determination of death, ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"30nku","text":"3.time of brain death (DBD), ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3e0hh","text":"4.time of cardiac arrest (DCD), ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bqsac","text":"5.time of cross clamp and cold flush, ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6a00h","text":"6.donor age","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"86md7","text":"7.gestational age at birth in weeks/days or born full term, ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1in3l","text":"8.demographics and anthropometrics including race and ethinicity, weight, height, ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"efkon","text":"9.medication exposure in hospital, ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7h1bh","text":"10.number of days on mechanical ventilation leading up to recovery, ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e0fjr","text":"11.most recent ventilator settings and minimum of last arterial blood gas with vent settings and FiO2, ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2ldd4","text":"12.recent chest XRay reports including any CT/MRI type imaging, ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"53rlk","text":"13.recent bronchoscopy reports, ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b0urv","text":"14.test results of any blood, urine, respiratory tract, including sputum, samples","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cd899","text":"15.recent CBC, ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"26q3o","text":"16.current diagnoses, ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3oma4","text":"17.current serologies (at minimum HepB, HepC, HIV, syphilis, CMV, EBV), ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"efm0","text":"18.past medical history including diagnoses, ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ftouh","text":"19.medications taken at home, ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7jsr7","text":"20.history of smoking, vaping, drugs of abuse, ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3o55u","text":"21.COVID-19 immunization and exposure history, ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4kjd6","text":"22. results and dates of any viral testing including respiratory viral PCR panels and any confirmatory positive or negative testing for SARS CoV2 infection","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: 608.1 Donor Acceptance Criteria for URMC HTC SARS-CoV-2 / COVID-19 Cases
